import './App.css'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const Portfolio = () => { const [firstBox, setFirstBox] = useState(false) const [contVis, setContVis] = useState('') const [boxVis1, setBoxVis1] = useState('') const [boxVis2, setBoxVis2] = useState('') const [boxVis3, setBoxVis3] = useState('') const [waveani, setWaveAni] = useState('') const handleClick = () =>{ if (firstBox == false){ setFirstBox(true) setContVis('content') setBoxVis1('box1') setBoxVis2('box2') setBoxVis3('box3') setWaveAni('waves') }else if(firstBox == true){ setFirstBox(false) setContVis('') setBoxVis1('') setBoxVis2('') setBoxVis3('') setWaveAni('') } } return (

Sam Losh

Web designer

); } export default Portfolio;
